title: Tightrope: Book 2
description: The much-anticipated conclusion to Lexi and Hunter’s story!My life is in shreds, and the life I desperately want seems further away than ever. I’m stalked by my past and abandoned by my future. Broken and bloody, I yearn for the one man who makes me feel alive.Then a late-night knock on my door turns my life around. Do I dare hope that fate, that hateful bitch, is done with me? Is it time for things to finally go my way?With everything I want within my grasp, I will fight to my last breath to protect what evil threatens to steal from me.I close my eyes and take the biggest leap of all, free-falling off the tightrope without a safety net. I pray the man I love is there to catch me before I hit the ground.
author: Maddie Wade
